A **wand of slow monster** is a type of [wand](/wiki/Wand "Wand") that appears in *[NetHack](/wiki/NetHack "NetHack")*.

[ ]

## Contents

- [1 Description](#Description)
- [2 Strategy](#Strategy)
- [3 History](#History)
- [4 Messages](#Messages)
- [5 Variants](#Variants)
  - [5.1 FIQHack](#FIQHack)
- [6 See also](#See_also)

## Description

[Zapping](/wiki/Zapping "Zapping") a wand of slow monster in a given direction will produce a [beam](/wiki/Beam "Beam") that causes monsters in its path to [slow down](/wiki/Speed "Speed"), with a chance for affected monsters to resist based on their [MR score](/wiki/Monster_magic_resistance "Monster magic resistance") (using the equation MR112 − [difficulty](/wiki/Monster_difficulty "Monster difficulty") - monsters with [intrinsic speed](/wiki/Intrinsic_speed "Intrinsic speed") will instead return to normal speed. Monsters will not zap this wand. Slowed monsters move at 2⁄3 of their normal movement speed; slowing down any monster or returning them to normal speed with the wand will [auto-identify](/wiki/Auto-identify "Auto-identify") it.

If zapped while you are [engulfed](/wiki/Engulfed "Engulfed") by a [whirly](/wiki/Whirly "Whirly") monster (e.g. a [vortex](/wiki/Vortex "Vortex") or [air elemental](/wiki/Air_elemental "Air elemental")), you will disrupt the monster and be released.

If you zap yourself with a wand of slow monster while you have intrinsic speed, you will lose that intrinsic and [abuse](/wiki/Abuse "Abuse") [dexterity](/wiki/Dexterity "Dexterity") - otherwise, nothing happens.

[Engraving](/wiki/Engraving "Engraving") with the wand will cause the bugs on the floor to slow down; while this is a unique message, it will not auto-identify the wand.

## Strategy

Whirly monsters are immune to the [wand of digging](/wiki/Wand_of_digging "Wand of digging"), making the wand a valuable escape item when engulfed by them. Slowing whirly monsters such as an [energy vortex](/wiki/Energy_vortex "Energy vortex") can let a faster player (e.g. with [speed boots](/wiki/Speed_boots "Speed boots")) build up valuable distance to attack them at range, and many whirly monsters have an MR score of 30 at most - the [fog cloud](/wiki/Fog_cloud "Fog cloud") has an even lower score at 0, and will never resist the wand. Air elementals are the most worrisome whirlies by far, and still move at twice a player's normal speed even when slowed; the wand still provides a valuable escape from being engulfed and pummeled with debris for several turns.

For other monsters, the wand of slow monster is best used at range against faster low-MR threats such as [soldier ants](/wiki/Soldier_ant "Soldier ant"), [leocrottas](/wiki/Leocrotta "Leocrotta") or [winged gargoyles](/wiki/Winged_gargoyle "Winged gargoyle"). More powerful threats usually have a much higher MR score and are better handled through other means such as [scaring](/wiki/Scaring "Scaring") or [paralysis](/wiki/Paralysis "Paralysis"); spellcasters are likely to re-haste themselves after some amount of turns.

A wand of slow monster is trivial to identify via engraving, since no other wand will produce the same message.

## History

The wand of slow monster has been present in the game since hack121, a variant of [Jay Fenlason's Hack](/wiki/Jay_Fenlason%27s_Hack "Jay Fenlason's Hack").

## Messages

- The bugs on the \<floor> slow down!

  You engraved with a charged wand of slow monster. This is a unique message, however the wand is not [auto-identified](/wiki/Auto-identify "Auto-identify").

- \<Monster> seems to be moving slower.

  You zapped a monster which did not resist.

- You disrupt \<monster>! A huge hole opens up...

  You zapped a whirly monster that you were engulfed in, and were expelled.

- You slow down.

  You lost the speed intrinsic by zapping yourself with a wand of slow monster.

- Your quickness feels less natural.

  As above, but you still have extrinsic speed from wearing speed boots.

## Variants

### FIQHack

In [FIQHack](/wiki/FIQHack "FIQHack"), [free action](/wiki/Free_action "Free action") prevents you or a monster from being slowed with the wand or other sources 2⁄3 of the time. [Blue dragon scale mail](/wiki/Blue_dragon_scale_mail "Blue dragon scale mail") also grants full protection from slowing effects such as being zapped with the wand.

## See also

- [Spellbook of slow monster](/wiki/Spellbook_of_slow_monster "Spellbook of slow monster")
- [Wand of speed monster](/wiki/Wand_of_speed_monster "Wand of speed monster")
